copy.header: The Pixie Hollow Code of Conduct
copy.body1: The changing of the seasons is like magic, isn't it? Spring flowers seem to know just when to bloom. Summer berries seem to know just when to ripen. In autumn, leaves seem to know just the right moment to drop from their branches.
copy.body2: How does all this happen? Who gathers flower petals as they float on the breeze or chooses the perfect dewdrops to place on blades of grass? The seasons are full of so many details. How do they all come together so smoothly?
copy.body3: The answer is simple: It is all because of Fairies. The Fairies in Pixie Hollow are real, and it is their hard work that brings each season to the mainland.
copy.body4: Fairies live in the heart of Never Land in a place called Pixie Hollow. This magical domain spreads out in all directions and is divided into the four seasons: To the east lies lovely Spring Valley, golden-hued Autumn Forest is found to the west, the ever-snowy Winter Woods is to the north, and warm, sunny Summer Glade lies to the south.
copy.body5: Pixie Hollow's Fairies ensure that nature stays in balance, and that each season arrives just as it should. And fortunately for Fairies, work is play!
copy.body6: Are you ready to lend Tinker Bell and her friends a hand?
copy.body7: The water-talent Fairy, Silvermist, is always looking for help Bubble Bouncing fish upstream -- she needs to make sure they stay in Spring Valley's cool waters.
copy.body8: Iridessa, a light-talent Fairy, could use an extra pair of wings to help her light the fireflies -- they'll be needed when the Fairies bring summer to the mainland.
copy.body9: Rosetta, a garden-talent Fairy, really appreciates friends who help her catch much-needed flower petals as they flutter in the breeze.
copy.body10: And let's not forget the animal-talent Fairy Fawn, who can usually be found in the Pumpkin Patch gathering nuts and berries for all the animals preparing to settle in for the winter. She always appreciates a little help with her Harvest Hustle.
copy.body12: Don't forget to make new friends along the way. Fairies make sure there is always plenty of time for fun. They love chatting, playing games, and making new friends!
copy.body13: It's a good thing Fairies are here to watch over nature. They ensure that it stays in balance -- and they love doing it.
